doc.after: Alessandro finding both princesses captivating still cannot decide between the two of them He encourages them both equally which drives the ladies to distraction Roxana a captive makes melting appeals to Alessandro to free her and show his magnanimity Alessandro hesitates to do so fearing that she will then leave him but finally agrees to release her from her bondage
